experience.title: SWE III
experience.description: Enhanced Google's Converter API, increasing processing speed by 90% and integrating Differential Privacy AI to securely manage over one billion daily reports. Developed an innovative OLAP system with integrated Large Language Model, enhancing data querying efficiency and enabling complex analyses across multiple databases using simple language. Pioneered the development of advanced in-browser AI models to address privacy challenges posed by third-party cookie deprecation, utilizing JavaScript, C++, and distributed computing for enhanced, privacy-compliant digital experiences.

experience.title: Public Relations Head
experience.description: The Entrepreneurship Cell is a non-profit organization run by the students of IIT Bombay that aims at manifesting the latent entrepreneurial spirit of the young students. We at E-Cell host various workshops, speaker sessions, innovative games, competitions for aspiring entrepreneurs and support them by providing necessary resources such as seed funding, mentoring, consultancy and networking.Initiativesâ€¢E-Summit: The annual flagship event, a networking hub for corporates, professionals and budding entrepreneurs from all across the nation.â€¢Eureka!: Asia's largest B-Plan Competition as recognized by Thomson Reuters.â€¢National Entrepreneurship Challenge(NEC) - Created with the vision to promote entrepreneurship amidst all the campuses in India, National Entrepreneurship Challenge is the first of its kind pan-India competition undertaken by The Entrepreneurship Cell , IIT Bombay.â€¢EnB-Club: This new initiative aims to create an ecosystem for the budding entrepreneurs in the institute.â€¢ Being the Public Relations Head,leading a 2-tier team consisting of 160 volunteers to design and execute impeccably, publicity campaigns targeted at varied categories of students across India
experience.description_html: The Entrepreneurship Cell is a non-profit organization run by the students of IIT Bombay that aims at manifesting the latent entrepreneurial spirit of the young students. We at E-Cell host various workshops, speaker sessions, innovative games, competitions for aspiring entrepreneurs and support them by providing necessary resources such as seed funding, mentoring, consultancy and networking.Initiativesâ€¢E-Summit: The annual flagship event, a networking hub for corporates, professionals and budding entrepreneurs from all across the nation.â€¢Eureka!: Asia's largest B-Plan Competition as recognized by Thomson Reuters.â€¢National Entrepreneurship Challenge(NEC) - Created with the vision to promote entrepreneurship amidst all the campuses in India, National Entrepreneurship Challenge is the first of its kind pan-India competition undertaken by The Entrepreneurship Cell , IIT Bombay.â€¢EnB-Club: This new initiative aims to create an ecosystem for the budding entrepreneurs in the institute.â€¢ Being the Public Relations Head,leading a 2-tier team consisting of 160 volunteers to design and execute impeccably, publicity campaigns targeted at varied categories of students across India

projects.title: Chain Reaction Game
projects.description: Created the desktop version of the popular Android game Chain Reaction in C++ and using simplecpp graphics library. We also added AI to play a single player game.

projects.title: Chicago Negative Population Growth - NLP
projects.description: Illinois is famous for being one of the very few states in the country with negative population growth. Through the articles in this project, we were able to gather the below mentioned insights-The key reasons for declining population are closely related to the negative sentiment articles which point towards- Law, Police cases, stock market and season.On the positive side Chicago is cherished for its- Food, people, teamwork environment, music, game season and high turnover companies.We observed that there was an evident spike in the average positive sentiment across the articles during the month of March.

projects.title: Yellow New York Taxi Fare Prediction- Big Data
Analysis of Covid Cases Across Countries- Machine Learning
projects.description: Used- Neo4j, OpenRefine, Google Cloud, etc.Our project focuses on leveraging publicly available data sources and build status quoprojections. We will be utilizing various economic and demographic indicators acrosscountries along with their reported COVID-19 statistics.
